title: Intra MEC Programming Contest 2025 — Announcement
excerpt: Get ready for the biggest coding showdown at MEC! Registration opens soon with multiple tracks and exciting prizes.
content: We are excited to announce the Intra MEC Programming Contest 2025. The contest will feature beginner and advanced tracks, team and solo categories, and problem sets designed by our mentors...

title: Hands-on Robotics Workshop — Recap
excerpt: A quick recap of our robotics workshop covering sensors, actuators, and line-following logic.
content: We covered Arduino basics, motor drivers, IR sensors, and control loops. Teams built and tuned simple line-following robots...

title: LLM Study Circle — Kickoff
excerpt: We kicked off our LLM study circle. Here’s the reading list and project ideas for the semester.
content: We will explore tokenizer mechanics, attention, fine-tuning, and evaluation with small open-source models. Projects include dataset curation and prompt tooling...

title: Project Spotlight: Campus Navigator App
excerpt: A student-built app to navigate campus facilities with offline maps and quick search.
content: The app features wayfinding, searchable POIs, and offline caching. Built with React Native and Maplibre...
